EmailTemplate.description: Sent to Main Contact on Schools before a Puppet Show
EmailTemplate.name: Puppet Show Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Our Camp Quality Puppets can't wait to meet you tomorrow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{{PuppetShow__c.School_Main_Contact__c}}}
Our staff and puppets are super excited to meet you and can't wait to perform at {{{PuppetShow__c.Venue__c}}} tomorrow!
If you have any last minute queries or need to rebook, please contact us as soon as possible on 1300 662 267.
See you soon!
